```{r}
library(yfinance)
library(tidyverse)
```

# Find the yahoo finance ticker, in order to download data
```{r}

companies <- c("AstraZeneca", "Amgen", "Bristol-Myers Squibb", "Eli Lilly and Company", "Johnson & Johnson", "Merck & Co.", "Novartis", "Pfizer Inc.")


yfinance::search_stock(search_term = companies, keep_results = "top")


tibble(
  companies = companies
) %>% 
  mutate(
    ticker = yfinance::search_stock(search_term = companies, keep_results = "top")$symbol,
    full_name = yfinance::search_stock(search_term = companies, keep_results = "top")$longname,
  ) %>% 
  group_by(ticker) %>% 
  mutate(
    balance_sheet = list(yfinance::get_bs(ticker = ticker, report_type = "quarterly"))
  )

```

```{r}
yfinance::get_bs(ticker = "GME", report_type = "quarterly")
```
